long_description: Sized to fit in a pocket, the deceptively small SureFire E2L flashlight features a two-stage LED that blasts a superbright beam of light. Rugged aerospace-grade aluminum body withstands regular use in the outdoors and around the house; O-rings seal out moisture. Total Internal Reflection (TIR) lens focuses light into a smooth beam with maximum output. High and low settings let you choose the lighting level that works best for you; rear push-button on/off switch is simple to operate. Press button part way down for momentary on/off; press farther for constant use. Knurled handle and on/off button provide a sure grip. Clip on handle lets you attach the light to a hat brim, belt or pocket. Operates on 2 CR123 batteries (included); batteries provide up to 100 hrs. of operation on low and 11 hrs. on high.
short_description: Sized to fit in a pocket, the deceptively small SureFire E2L flashlight features a two-stage LED that blasts a superbright beam of light.
